author: zhguo
msg: Set default value of *shindig.host* to localhost.

author: zhguo
msg: - Updated rave-shindig/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/web.xml to use the web.xml from shindig-3.0.0-beta2 with our change integrated.  For the original version, setting system property shindig.host does NOT work. For this updated version, it works.
- Add a configuration property in rave-portal/pom.xml by which the user can easily specify value of system property *shindig.host*.

author: stack
msg: HBASE-3872 Hole in split transaction rollback; edits to .META. need to be rolled back even if it seems like they didn't make it; fix failing HRegion test -- server passed is null, allow for this in tests when running splits
